header.title: Domain Analysis Model: Vital Records, Release 1

div2.head: Notes to Readers
div2.p: The linked files comprise the final Vital Records Domain Analysis Model, Release 1 Informative Document and its supporting materials.
Readers wishing to review the domain material are directed first to the Vital Records DAM Project overview, and then to the other following files:

loc.href: V3DAM_VR_ R1_INFORM_2011APR_Section 1_Vital Records Domain Analysis Model Project Overview.pdf

div2.p: For questions please contact Michelle Williamson (mwilliamson@cdc.gov).
